name: Tweeter-in-Chief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
President Trump has turned Twitter into a direct pipeline to the American people. Get unbiased context and daily updates so you don’t miss a tweet. 

The “Tweeter-in-Chief” skill gives every citizen a great way to follow along. Because these tweets are tremendous. Really, really great stuff. #THE BEST! 

"Tweeter-in-Chief" is an Otto Radio production. To hear every episode as well as top news and podcasts personalized to your interests, download Otto Radio for free on the Apple App Store or Google Play.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
